name: Vegan French Toast
description: This vegan French toast without milk and eggs is super easy to make and so delicious! You need only 5 ingredients and it's ready in 5 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup almond milk or other plant-based milk
1/2 can very thick coconut milk (full fat) ((chill in the fridge overnight))
